Submodules¶

convlab.modules.nlu.multiwoz.error module¶

class convlab.modules.nlu.multiwoz.error.ErrorNLU(act_type_rate=0.0, slot_rate=0.0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Base model for generating NLU error.

apply(dialog_act)[source]¶

Apply the error model on dialog act. :param dialog_act: Dialog act. :type dialog_act: tuple

Returns:Dialog act with noise.
Return type:dialog_act (tuple)
set_error_rate(act_type_rate, slot_rate)[source]¶

Set error rate parameter for error model. :param act_type_rate: The error rate applied on dialog act type. :type act_type_rate: float :param slot_rate: Error rate applied on slots. :type slot_rate: float

convlab.modules.nlu.multiwoz.evaluate module¶

Evaluate NLU models on Multiwoz test dataset Metric: dataset level Precision/Recall/F1 Usage: PYTHONPATH=../../../.. python evaluate.py [OneNetLU|MILU|SVMNLU]

convlab.modules.nlu.multiwoz.evaluate.da2triples(dialog_act)[source]¶

Initialization Strategy

convlab.modules.nlu.multiwoz.utils.mergeDicts(d0, d1)[source]¶

for all k in d0, d0 += d1 . d’s are dictionaries of key -> numpy array
